seo.title: Build real-time editing into your React site
seo.description: Open-source editing UI designed for the Jamstack. Write to any backend.

blocks.headline: Unlock your Next.js project with live editing
blocks.subline: Empower your teammates to build and edit content stored in your Git repository.

items.headline: Align your Team on the GitHub Flow
items.subline: Keep ownership of your content in Markdown and JSON files and empower all teammates to update your website through a user-friendly interface.

items.headline: Build on Top of Your Components
items.subline: Add a custom editing interface on top of your React Components, with block-based data and nested forms, content teams have the power to manage and build complex pages.

items.headline: Real-Time Visual Feedback
items.subline: Be productive, see changes apply in real time when you edit your content on your live website Submit changes and itâ€™s live!

items.headline: Query Your Content
items.subline: Tina Cloud provides a GraphQL layer on top of the files stored in your repository, allowing you to query content across all your files.

items.headline: Command Line Quickstart
items.subline: The Tina CLI can be used to set up your project with Tina configuration and a basic content API, ready for you to tailor to your project.
